PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-03222008-02-18,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Industry of SCOTT ALLISON of Oakville, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis for a term of four years, in the place of Chris Cahill, effective March 24, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
